{{cpp/title|feupdateenv}}
{{cpp/numeric/fenv/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header | cfenv}}
{{dcl | since=c++11 |
int feupdateenv( const std::fenv_t* envp )
}}
{{dcl end}}

First, remembers the currently raised floating-point exceptions, then restores the floating-point environment from the object pointed to by {{tt|envp}} (similar to {{lc|std::fesetenv}}), then raises the floating-point exceptions that were saved.

This function may be used to end the non-stop mode established by an earlier call to {{lc|std::feholdexcept}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par | envp | pointer to the object of type {{c|std::fenv_t}} set by an earlier call to {{lc|std::feholdexcept}} or {{tt|std::fegetenv}} or equal to {{lc|FE_DFL_ENV}}}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|0}} on success, non-zero otherwise.
